Synopsis:
---------
World War II (1939-1945).Kefalonia (Greece), 1940.Dr.Iannis (John Hurt) lives on the outskirts of town with his daughter and student Pelagia (Penelope Cruz), the fiancee MANDRAS (Bale), a fisherman who participates in the contest against the Italians.Months pass and Pelagia receives no response to the many letters sent to her boyfriend.When the Italian army occupies Cephalonia, soldiers, take your stay on the island as a summer vacation, soon earn the confidence of the natives, thanks to his joy, his music and his desire to live.In exchange for medical supplies, Dr. Iannis accepts stay at home to Captain Corelli (Nicolas Cage), a man full of love for life, music and Pelagia.
